localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Simply Snack is the easiest way to keep track of your food and diet. Log your food easily by just taking a picture of it. There’s no need for long descriptions or dull questions – and no need to stress about what you should or shouldn’t eat.
blogPost.body: Simply Snack is the easiest way to keep track of your food and diet. Log your food easily by just taking a picture of it. There’s no need for long descriptions or dull questions – and no need to stress about what you should or shouldn’t eat.
blogPost.title: Simply Snack - Your daily meals at a glance.
blogPost.author: Saurav Kumar

localize.description: 简单地说，零食是记录你的食物和饮食的最简单的方法。只需拍一张照片，就可以很容易地记录你的食物。不需要冗长的描述或枯燥的问题-也不需要强调你应该吃什么或不应该吃什么。
localize.tagline: 您的日常用餐一目了然。

localize.description: 簡單地說，零食是記錄你的食物和飲食的最簡單的方法。只需拍一張照片，就可以很容易地記錄你的食物。不需要冗長的描述或枯燥的問題-也不需要強調你應該喫什麼或不應該喫什麼。
localize.tagline: 您的日常用餐一目瞭然。

previous.excerpt: Think your company is data driven? Probably. But how do you ensure your data is creating real value for your customers? In this eBook, you’ll learn how use your data to: 👩🏼‍💻 Empower your customers 🏆 Improve your product offering 📈 Drive enduring growth
previous.title: From Data-Driven to Data Everywhere - How to drive growth with user-facing analytics

localize.description: 认为你的公司是数据驱动的？可能吧。但你如何确保你的数据为客户创造真正的价值？在这本电子书中，您将学习如何使用您的数据。赋予你的客户权力 🏆 改善你的产品供应 📈 推动持久的增长。
localize.tagline: 如何通过面向用户的分析来推动增长？

localize.description: 認爲你的公司是數據驅動的？可能吧。但你如何確保你的數據爲客戶創造真正的價值？在這本電子書中，您將學習如何使用您的數據。賦予你的客戶權力 🏆 改善你的產品供應 📈 推動持久的增長。
localize.tagline: 如何通過面向用戶的分析來推動增長？

next.excerpt: Incident Timer is a “days without incident” timer for developers. The beautifully designed dashboard helps you to keep track of major software incidents. It’s free and takes just 2 minutes to set up.
next.title: Incident Timer - A “days without incident” timer for developers

localize.description: Incident Timer是一款专为开发者设计的 "天无事故 "计时器。设计精美的仪表盘可以帮助你跟踪重大软件事件。它是免费的，只需要2分钟就可以设置。
localize.tagline: 开发者的 "无事故天数 "计时器

localize.description: Incident Timer是一款專爲開發者設計的 "天無事故 "計時器。設計精美的儀表盤可以幫助你跟蹤重大軟件事件。它是免費的，只需要2分鐘就可以設置。
localize.tagline: 開發者的 "無事故天數 "計時器
